sub_title: Assistant professor of Language and Communication, VU Amsterdam
summary: Strong project management, teamwork, and communication skills based on ten years in academic social science research in US, Netherlands, UK, and Switzerland. Keen to discover how I might best apply aptitudes for lasting change.

- Co-launched wiki for discipline-specific bibliography, which quickly became go-to resource for discipline', 'title': 'PhD Researcher', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 5372, 'name': 'UC Santa Barbara', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQHEZRcLGw73jQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519857180481?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=II4bhsfVkBa9xVvr1dHoj5-ARZEhFcvM0JBYZ_DTIog', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/ucsantabarbara/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Santa Barbara, California', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'UC Santa Barbara', 'description': '• Organized and led four linguistics courses: Introduction to Linguistics, Phonetics, Historical Linguistics, and Syntax

• Invited to give guest lectures in Introduction to Linguistics, Historical Linguistics, and Syntax', 'title': 'Graduate Teaching Assistant', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 3441, 'name': 'Peace Corps', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEDdGuha87grg/company-logo_400_400/0/1606758308506?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=4UJcXbyx5iqeI-_wrl2rXeQjywc8OQkNyNDGE-JIVTo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/peace-corps/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Halaç, Turkmenistan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'Peace Corps', 'description': "• Designed and implemented culturally appropriate English lessons for a Turkmen village school, directly instructed 500+ students grades 1-10, and trained two local teachers in contemporary pedagogic techniques

• Secured grant funding from USAID ($300) and the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe ($6000) for a month-long summer camp for disabled people

• Expanded by 300% the entries for letters A-D as editor of the English-Turkmen Learner's Dictionary, conducting fieldwork with a native-language consultant and maintaining detailed documentation for future editors to continue its expansion

• Certified as Advanced-Mid in spoken Turkmen by a Peace Corps Language Proficiency Interview Tester (November 2009)

• Organized two summer camps for young children, a campus beautification project with teachers and students, and student clubs for English, health, geography, and art

• Provided six hours of training for Peace Corps volunteers on linguistic and grammatical aspects of teaching English, and two hours of training on diversity-related issues in Peace Corps", 'title': 'English Teacher and Teacher Trainer', 'employment_type': None}]}]
